content: unless you want to be able to undress her for skirt use sock wool i used berger de france goomy 50 imprim ciel and 3 75mm needles cast on 35 sts for length of skirt and work in st st it is knitted sideways in stocking stitch to make use of the striped pattern of wool knit approx 45 cm block sew short ends together with right side facing using 3 75mm pick up and knit sts all along one long edge 2 sts for every 3 row should be right i used a long flexible circular needle and the same yarn as used for the cap working round cast off as follows cast off 2 *slip st back to left needle cast on 2 cast off 4 and repeat do not work tightly this edging helps counteract the curly-uppies turn skirt inside out if you have used patterned wool choose the nicest pattern for the front mark with pin and also mark the centre back in the same way place on doll and put the pins through the body as well 11 place a pin either side of the hips allowing enough space for doll to get out of skirt remove pins which held skirt to doll take it off and back stitch along the top edges either side from pin to fold secure thread then return to pin using a running stitch over previous sewing pull thread tightly to form gathers secure thread then oversew across the gathered section a couple of times back and forth then finish repeat on other side of skirt turn right side out and starting cenre back run a gathering thread all around waist leaving both ends of thread loose put on doll draw up thread and secure tightly with knot 12 bodice i used plain coloured adriafil azzurra same needles as skirt sleeves cast on 9 work 16 row st st next k2tg k5 ssk next row p2tg k3 p2tg put 5 sts on safety pin main part uses short row the number of stitches after a cast off includes the one left on the
